titles.title: To provide for the retroactive entitlement of Ed W. Freeman to Medal of Honor special pension.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 9/10/2002--Introduced. Makes Ed W. Freeman of Boise, Idaho, eligible retroactively, for months beginning with November 1965 and ending with June 2001, for the special pension provided in conjunction with the award of the Medal of Honor.
